title: Double deal
creator_credit: Rychemond Film, Brian Kavanagh and Lynn Barker
brief_description: The wife of a businessman is bored and sexually frustrated so she takes up with a drifter who involves her in various crimes including kidnapping and murder. Mystery thriller. Stars Angela Punch McGregor and Louis Jourdan.
